state_summary: Founder Bianca Cefalo left her job to start Space DOTs, a company that detects space threats using software platform SKY-I. She raised $1.5 million in seed funding.
evidence: Bianca Cefalo is the founder of Space DOTs
Space DOTs launched in 2022 to detect space threats
The company has received $3.2 million in total funding

metadata.investor_name: Female Founders Fund, Feel Ventures, General Electric Company, Sie Ventures
